Default.OnPaneInit:
(block ( (hpLeft (objGetProperty gSource 'structuralHP)) (hpMax (objGetProperty gSource 'maxStructuralHP)) (intactPercent (/ hpLeft hpMax))
(sourceItem (objGetData gSource 'SourceItem)) (mass (itmGetMass sourceItem)) (fitsInCargo (gr (objGetCargoSpaceLeft gPlayerShip) mass))
(condition (switch (gr intactPercent 1) 'impossible
(gr intactPercent 0.99) 'perfect
(gr intactPercent 0.9) 'excellent
(gr intactPercent 0.8) 'great
(gr intactPercent 0.6) 'damagedSomewhat
(gr intactPercent 0.4) 'damaged
(gr intactPercent 0.25) 'damagedHeavily
'unrecoverable ))
(recoverable (and fitsInCargo (!= condition 'unrecoverable))) ) (switch (= condition 'unrecoverable) (scrSetDescTranslate gScreen 'descStatusUnrecoverable { itemName: (itmGetName sourceItem 'noModifiers) angle: (objGetProperty gSource 'rotation) mass: (strMassString mass) })
(not fitsInCargo) (scrSetDescTranslate gScreen 'descStatusCannotFit { itemName: (itmGetName sourceItem 'noModifiers) angle: (objGetProperty gSource 'rotation) mass: (strMassString mass) condition: (scrTranslate gScreen (cat "condition." condition)) })
(scrSetDescTranslate gScreen 'descStatus { itemName: (itmGetName sourceItem 'noModifiers) angle: (objGetProperty gSource 'rotation) mass: (strMassString mass) condition: (scrTranslate gScreen (cat "condition." condition)) }) )
(scrEnableAction gScreen 'actionRecover recoverable) )

Actions.Action:
(block ( (hpMax (objGetProperty gSource 'maxStructuralHP)) (hpLeft (objGetProperty gSource 'structuralHP))
recovered ) (setq recovered (objGetData gSource 'SourceItem))
; We allow the barricade station to be somewhat damaged ; before damage transfers to the item (which limits the station to half hp)
(if (ls (/ hpLeft hpMax) 0.70) (setq recovered (itmSetProperty recovered 'damaged True)) )
; But we also store the structural HP on the item, in case ; it gets deployed again.
(if (ls hpLeft hpMax) (setq recovered (itmSetData recovered 'structuralHP hpLeft)) )
(objAddItem gPlayerShip recovered) (objDestroy gSource) )

TranscendenceModule.Globals:
(block () (setq intBarricadeUse (lambda (barricadeClass) (block (barricade orientation)
(setq orientation (shpGetDirection gPlayerShip))
; Create a barricade (setq barricade (sysCreateStation barricadeClass (sysVectorPolarOffset gPlayerShip orientation 2)))
(objSetProperty barricade 'rotation orientation)
; If the item is damaged, then the barricade is damaged
(switch (itmGetData gItem 'structuralHP) (objSetProperty barricade 'structuralHP (itmGetData gItem 'structuralHP))
(itmIsDamaged gItem) (objSetProperty barricade 'structuralHP (divide (objGetProperty barricade 'maxStructuralHP) 2)) )
; Remember the item we used so we can recover it (objSetData barricade 'SourceItem (itmSetCount gItem 1))
; Use up the item (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) ) )) )
